overview: Margaret Donnelly has over 25 years of technology marketing and business development experience in the telecommunications, services, and computer hardware and software industries at companies such as Firetide, ArrayComm, SkyTel, Commtouch and Pyramid Technology. Margaret co-founded the Personal Broadband Industry Association and has served as an industry analyst and marketing advisor for a diverse set of businesses. A recent transplant from Silicon Valley, Margaret has survived her first New England winter and is active in the local arts community.
